nodes.description: 伊朗查巴哈拉警局遭自杀式袭击，造成至少2人死亡
nodes.support_text: A suicide car bomber has attacked a police headquarters in the Iranian port city of Chabahar, killing at least two people and wounding several others, according to state TV.

nodes.description: Ansar al-Furqan组织一年前炸毁伊朗南部输油管道
nodes.support_text: A year ago the group claimed to have blown up an oil pipeline in Iran’s southern Khuzestan province.

nodes.description: 美国去年重新实施对伊朗制裁，部分源于伊核协议退出
nodes.support_text: Last month the US reimposed sanctions on Iran that had been lifted after Tehran’s nuclear deal with world powers.

nodes.description: 阿瓦兹军事游行遭伪装士兵袭击，致多人伤亡
nodes.support_text: In September, gunmen disguised as soldiers opened fire on a military parade in Ahvaz, killing and wounding dozens.

nodes.description: 议会和霍梅尼陵墓遭极端组织袭击，造成18人死亡
nodes.support_text: In June last year a coordinated Isis assault on parliament and the shrine of Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini, the leader of Iran’s 1979 Islamic revolution, killed at least 18 people and wounded more than 50.

nodes.description: Rahmdel Bameri报告自杀式袭击事件
nodes.support_text: Rahmdel Bameri reported a suicide bombing incident

nodes.description: 自杀式袭击者开车冲向警察总部
nodes.support_text: A suicide attacker drove towards police headquarters

nodes.description: 警员封锁载有炸弹的车辆
nodes.support_text: Police officers blocked a vehicle containing explosives

nodes.description: 警员开始向袭击者射击
nodes.support_text: Police officers began shooting at the attacker

nodes.description: Ansar al-Furqan在伊朗东南部省份活动
nodes.support_text: Ansar al-Furqan在伊朗东南部省份活动

nodes.description: 特朗普部分退出核协议
nodes.support_text: 特朗普部分退出核协议

nodes.description: 伊朗支持黎巴嫩真主党等武装团体
nodes.support_text: 伊朗支持黎巴嫩真主党等武装团体

nodes.description: 阿拉伯分离主义者和伊斯兰国宣称对此负责
nodes.support_text: 阿拉伯分离主义者和伊斯兰国宣称对此负责

edges.support_text: A year ago the group claimed to have blown up an oil pipeline in Iran’s southern Khuzestan province.
根据事件描述中的时间逻辑
Last month the US reimposed sanctions on Iran...
In September, gunmen disguised as soldiers opened fire on a military parade in Ahvaz...
In June last year a coordinated Isis assault... killed at least 18 people and wounded more than 50.
报告事件后立即发生袭击行动
袭击者接近后触发封锁
伊朗遵守协议后特朗普退出
特朗普退出导致美国制裁重启
伊朗支持武装团体与Ansar al-Furqan活动关联
